positionsListing.title: Project Manager
positionsListing.content:
Skills (What is required?)

  • Solid technical background, with understanding or hands-on experience in software development and web technologies.
  • Solid understanding of project management methods, methodologies, frameworks, terminology, and processes
    Bachelor’s or Masters degree in computer science or related field
  • PMP or Project Management Certifications is a plus
  • Minimum of 5 years of IT project management from conception to delivery experience is must
  • Experience in Documentation on Mind Maps, Technical Specification and System Architecture /Flow Diagram /Sequence Diagram/ User Guide, Jira, etc
  • Proven experience in creating project-related documents
  • Should have handled over 5 projects simultaneously.
  • Should have solid organizational skills, including multitasking and time management.
  • Strong problem-solving skills along with excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Agile knowledge is highly desired

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Track project performance to ensure all goals and quality standards are met
  • Maintain communication between the team, stakeholders, and clients throughout the project life-cycle.
  • Ensure quality and on-time project delivery to the client within the agreed budget.
  • Organize and define a smooth workflow between teams, daily reporting from and to between teams involved at all stages of the project.
  • Priorities projects and allocate them among the development and designing team on a daily basis.
  • Lead the team toward delivering our customer’s solution in time and within budget
  • Continuous client interface and build healthy business relationships ensuring client loyalty for the company.
  • Support to a team in critical technical issues and Skill enhancement.

positionsListing.title: Content Writer
positionsListing.content:
Job Responsibilities

  • Conducting in-depth research on industry-related topics in order to develop original content.
  • Developing content for blogs, articles, product descriptions, social media, and the company website.
  • Assisting the marketing team in developing content for advertising campaigns.
  • Proofreading content for errors and inconsistencies.
  • Editing and polishing existing content to improve readability.
  • Conducting keyword research and using SEO best practices to increase traffic to the company website.
  • Creating compelling headlines and body copy that will capture the attention of the target audience.
  • Identifying the organization’s needs and recommending new content to address gaps in the company’s current content.

Content Writer Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in communications, marketing, English, etc
  • Having experience in IT domain is a plus.
  • Proven content writing or copywriting experience.
  • Working knowledge of content management systems.
  • Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications.
  • A portfolio of published articles.
  • Excellent writing and editing skills.
  • The ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
  • The ability to handle multiple projects concurrently.
  • Effective communication skills.

positionsListing.title: Lead Generation Executive
positionsListing.content:
Technical skills (What is required?)

  • Expert knowledge of generating leads tools and techniques
  • Experience of using a CRM system to log calls, build contacts and record information
  • Good English language skills both written and spoken
  • Good communication skills
  • Microsoft Office

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Developing and maintaining the prospect database
  • Market research and testing in new and growing markets
  • Lead generating campaigns for email marketing
  • Demonstration and consultation meeting booking campaigns
  • Assisting the sales team to progress the sales cycle
  • Producing reports to show productivity of converted leads
  • Email marketing campaigns skills and experience of using any of them Zoho, Pipedrive, Mailchimp, hubspot is a plus

positionsListing.title: IT Recruiter
positionsListing.content:
Job Responsibilities

  • Manage and implement all recruiting tasks
  • Develop recruiting strategies that meet anticipated staffing needs
  • Collaborate with the hiring manager to understand the needs and roles to be filled; review job descriptions for vacancies.
  • Screening applicants for competency with the job requirements.
  • Arranging telephone, video, or in-person interviews.
  • Identify the most effective methods for recruiting and attracting candidates.
  • Search for candidates using various sources such as databases, internet recruiting resources, networking, job fairs, media advertisements, or employee referrals
  • Performing background and reference checks.
  • Offering job positions and completing the relevant paperwork.
  • Keep track of all applicants and keep applicants informed on the application process.

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Bachelor’s degree in Human resources or related field
  • Negotiation skills
  • Excellent interpersonal communication skills
  • Strong social aptitude and ability to build relationships
  • Technical knowledge to be able to talk to job prospects and understand qualifications

positionsListing.title: Sr. Full Stack Developer
positionsListing.content:
Technical skills (What is required?)

  • Deep understanding of SDLC and advance hands-on experience with software architecture and design
  • At least 4 years of experience in Designing Software Architecture for both frontend (React) and backend (Node)
  • Strong understanding of Express.js
  • Stronghold on MongoDB and experience on SQL databases is a plus (preferably Mysql & Postgresql.
  • Experience with GraphQL, Charts, Map, Payment Gateway
  • Good understanding of networking protocols and concepts like REST, HTTP/HTTPS
  • Understanding of core AWS services and AWS architecture best practices
  • Knowledge in CI/CD tools ( preferably Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus
  • Experience in the Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
  • Stronghold on Data Structures and Algorithms is a Plus.

Non-technical

  • Sound understanding of Agile and Scrum methodologies and ability to participate in local and remote Sprints
  • A good grasp of user experience is a plus
  • Should have experience working under Agile Methodology
  • Must have knowledge of Project management tools like Jira, Asana or Clickup
  • Should have experience in using Git & VSCode.
  • Ability to work in a diverse, multicultural, hybrid-team environment
  • Great communication and collaboration skills and a strong teamwork ethic
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Able to architect large software from scratch
  • Build and maintain web / cloud-based application
  • Bug fixing and monitoring analytics and performance
  • Maintain high standards of quality for code, documentation and other deliverables
  • Should involve in the scope discussion with the business analyst and business users to identify the technical requirements
  • Able to proactively communicate with non-technical stakeholders, manage expectations, and explain the value of addressing technical debt

positionsListing.title: React – Native Developer
positionsListing.content:
Technical skills (What is required?)

  • Minimum 2 year of strong experience in native development on Android Or iOS (Swift)
  • Experience in integrating API calls.
  • Strong hands-on experience in React Native design patterns like Redux, Flux, and Context API with Hooks
  • Extensive knowledge of object-oriented programming.
  • In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, functional programming, and front-end languages
  • Strong knowledge of React fundamentals such as Virtual DOM, component lifecycle, and component state
  • Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Android Studio, Visual Studio Code.
  • Knowledge of type checking, typescript, prop types, and code debugging
  • Understanding of building and deploying React Native applications to AppStore and Google Play stores.
  • Knowledge of user interface design and responsive designs
  • Well-versed in a variety of React Native software and technologies such as Jest, Enzyme, ESLint, and so on-
  • Knowledge of type checking, typescript, prop types, and code debugging

Non-technical

  • Should have experience working under Agile Methodology
  • Must have knowledge of Project management tools like Jira, Asana or Clickup
  • Should have experience in using Git & VSCode.
  • Aiming to achieve the goal with a Client-focused approach
  • Ability to work in a diverse, multicultural, hybrid-team environment
  • Must have strong interactive communication skills
  • Ability to learn and grow independently
  • Great attention to detail

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Create fully functional and user-friendly applications independently
  • Write clean, well-documented code that follows good coding practices
  • Build app and UI components from prototypes and wireframes
  • Work with Redux architecture to improve the performance of the websites/mobile apps

positionsListing.title: Shopify Developer
positionsListing.content:
Technical skills (What is required?)

  • Experience of Shopify custom theme development
  • Strong knowledge to Install & Customize new Shopify theme
  • Knowledge of liquid programming language
  • Clear concept of HTML5, CSS3, javascript/Jquery
  • Experience of working on e-commerce projects with different Shopify JS APIs (storefront, AJAX Cart, Sections, etc) is a plus
  • Knowledge in other ecommerce platforms like Magento, woocommerce will be a plus
  • Exposure to a minimum of 3 e-commerce projects (starting with requirement gathering). Is a plus

Non-technical

  • Should have experience working under Agile Methodology
  • Must have knowledge of Project management tools like Jira, Asana or Clickup
  • Should have experience in using Git & VSCode.
  • Ability to work in a diverse, multicultural, hybrid-team environment
  • Must have strong interactive communication skills
  • Ability to learn and grow independently
  • Great attention to detail

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Develop and implement Shopify sites in accordance with clients requirements and specifications
  • Generate custom – tailored Shopify theme and altering pre – existing template
  • Act as Shopify expert, s /;lpecializing in all facets of the ecommerce platform 
  • Convert design mockups (Figma, Zeplin, XD or Sketch) into functioning Shopify sites using HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, Liquid
  • Develop responsive HTML emails (Klaviyo)
  • Should identify & troubleshoot bugs regularly to improve performance
  • Should maintain excellent self-management skills to meet project deadlines
  • Consistently work on Improving coding standards
  • Actively participate in training sessions

positionsListing.title: Mern Stack Developer
positionsListing.content:
Technical skills (What is required?)

  • Strong understanding of express.js
  • Proficiency in Redux, JavaScript, Typescript, UI, UX concept
  • Stronghold on MongoDB and experience on SQL databases (preferably Mysql & Postgresql.
  • Experience with GraphQL, Charts, Map, Payment Gateway
  • Hands-on expertise in REST API, MySQL/PostgreSQL, WebSocket, MongoDB, Redis, etc.
  • Familiarity with Docker and AWS infrastructure is a plus
  • Familiarity with the whole web stack, including protocols and web server optimization techniques

Non-technical

  • Should have experience working under Agile Methodology
  • Must have knowledge of Project management tools like Jira, Asana or Clickup
  • Should have experience in using Git & VSCode.
  • Ability to learn and grow
  • Great attention to detail
  • Ability to work in a diverse, multicultural, hybrid-team environment
  • Must have strong interactive communication skills
  • Ability to learn and grow independently
  • Great attention to detail

Key Responsibilities (What you will be doing?)

  • Work on developing and improving the existing website through React
  • Participate in development life cycle activities like design, coding, testing, and production release.
  • Ensure that the code is implemented, unit-tested, and ready to be integrated into the product
